jobTitle: Litigation Administrative Assistant - Major National Firm
industry: Law Practice, Legal Services, and Courts of Law
description: A major national firm in Los Angeles is looking for a Litigation Administrative Assistant to join their Commercial Litigation practice group. Will be handling heavy calendars, opening new matters, and assisting with all other administrative functions.  Exceptional compensation and benefits. Please apply to Bridgeline Solutions today!
